backend/main.mo: Motoko backend managing inquiries and user profiles with admin/user access control and CRUD operations for inquiries.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping features to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing functionality of various frontend React components, hooks, pages, and utilities.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS variables and theme configuration for light/dark modes with OKLCH colors.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file bootstrapping the SPA with main.tsx and mounting #root.
frontend/PRODUCTION_SMOKE_TEST.md: Manual production smoke‑test checklist covering login, admin, homepage, and inquiry workflows.
frontend/public/404.html: SPA fallback page that stores the requested path then redirects to root for client‑side routing.
frontend/public/admin/index.html: Admin HTML entry point loading the SPA for the /admin route.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app handling routing, admin guard, deep‑link restoration, and rendering core site sections.
frontend/src/components/admin/AdminLogin: Empty component file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryAct: Admin controls for marking inquiries read/unread, deleting them, and includes bulk export utilities.
frontend/src/components/admin/InquiryLis: Admin panel list with search, filters, bulk actions, and detailed rendering of inquiry metadata.
frontend/src/components/admin/OfficialLo: Dialog for official login with form validation, loading state, and callback on successful login.
frontend/src/components/BrandMark.tsx: Logo component rendering the Vaishnavi PNG with size variants.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a styled fallback UI with a reset-to-home button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders site footer with business details, disclaimer, copyright, and a caffeine.ai credit link.
frontend/src/components/InquiryForm.tsx: Form for submitting inquiries with validation, success/error alerts, and API submission via useSubmitInquiry.
frontend/src/components/NavigationBar.ts: Responsive navigation bar with scroll detection, smooth section scrolling, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/sections/AdminLo: Empty section file with no implemented content.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Renders a contact section showing business address, operator, and phone/WhatsApp buttons using siteContent.
frontend/src/components/sections/FormSec: Displays a centered card containing the inquiry form with a title and description.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Implements the hero banner with business intro, call/WhatsApp actions, location, and an official login dialog.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Lists service categories and items from siteContent in responsive cards.
frontend/src/components/sections/WhyChoo: Shows a grid of reasons to choose the business pulled from siteContent.
frontend/src/content/siteContent.ts: Provides static site content including business info, hero text, services, reasons, and footer disclaimer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on user identity, initializing access control and invalidating dependent queries on changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminActor.ts: Builds an admin-capable actor using identity and admin token, initializing access control and invalidating admin queries when updated.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Provides hooks to fetch, delete, and update inquiry read status via the admin actor with error handling and query invalidation.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, handling login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialAdminToken: Retrieves and tracks the admin token from sessionStorage, updating state on custom or storage events.
frontend/src/hooks/useOfficialLogin.ts: Implements official admin login with hardcoded credentials, storing session state and token, plus logout and event-based sync.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines a React Query mutation for submitting inquiries through the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind styles and custom CSS variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard page that requires official login, fetches and displays inquiries, and handles errors and logout.
frontend/src/utils/adminError.ts: Utilities to extract readable error messages, detect authorization errors, and normalize thrown values.
frontend/src/utils/inquiryExport.ts: Provides CSV and JSON export utilities for inquiry data, including formatting and value escaping.
frontend/src/utils/navigation.ts: SPA navigation helper that updates browser history and triggers routing via popstate events.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading URL parameters, storing them in sessionStorage, and synchronizing persisted values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom OKLCH color tokens, container settings, animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, admin-login requirements, Hindi site content notes, known issues, and existing features for the Vaishnavi E-Mitra & CSC website.
